statements: UPDATE user_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 100.50 WHERE user_id = 'f7d1ba51-d564-4a25-8c00-25af839c3d71';
UPDATE user_accounts SET transaction_history = '{"type": "deposit", "amount": 50.25}' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE user_accounts SET transaction_history = '{"deposit": 100.00, "withdraw": 50.00}' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE user_accounts SET account_balance = 500.00, transaction_history = '{"deposit": 200.00, "withdraw": 100.00}' WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-1234-5678-9876543210ab';
UPDATE user_accounts SET account_balance = 5000.00, username = 'john_doe' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 100.50, description = 'Purchase for clothing' WHERE transaction_id = 201;
UPDATE user_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 100.00 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = amount - 50.00, description = 'Refund processed' WHERE transaction_id = 67890;

UPDATE account_security SET password_hash = 'new_password_hash', security_question = 'new_question' WHERE user_id = '98765432-1012-5432-1920-987654321012';
UPDATE users SET account_balance = account_balance - 1000 WHERE user_id = 1;

UPDATE addresses SET city = 'New York', country = 'USA' WHERE user_id = 102;
